nested_items.name: dashboardArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the dashboard, which has the following format.

nested_items.name: projectId
nested_items.description: The ID of the project that the dashboard is in.

nested_items.name: dashboardDefinition
nested_items.description: The dashboard's definition JSON literal. For detailed information, see Creating dashboards (CLI) in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: dashboardCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date the dashboard was created, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: dashboardLastUpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date the dashboard was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
